title: DDFP: SI's Jeff Pearlman and Denver WR Eric Decker get with the Program
itunes:title: DDFP: SI's Jeff Pearlman and Denver WR Eric Decker get with the Program
description:
Shek & Rank welcome "Sweetness: The Enigmatic Life of Walter Payton" author Jeff Pearlman to discuss the feedback he's gotten for telling the sometimes-dark story of an American legend, plus kibitz about the USFL and condiments; the fellas next yap with one of Tim Tebow's primary targets, Eric Decker; and finally, the DeLorean gets to 88mph to see who wins of this weekend's biggest games.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
